Poasa Faamausili has made an immediate impact on Stephen Kearney and the Warriors coach expects him to do the same for the team on the field on Friday.
Faamausili has joined the club on a short-term… [+3200 chars]

articles.title: ‘Who do you think you are?’: The day a Lions coach walked around the boundary line to spray Jonathan Brown - Fox Sports
articles.description: Before Jonathan Brown developed into one of the greatest forwards of the modern era, he was just like any recently-drafted AFL player trying to find his feet.
articles.content:
Then came an extraordinary mid-game spray from an irate Brisbane assistant coach a reality check that eventually led to a painful pre-season regime, which paid dividends.
Drafted by the Lions as a f… [+4913 chars]

articles.title: Jacco Verhaeren steps down as Swimming Australia's coach ahead of 2021 Tokyo Olympics - ABC News
articles.description: Jacco Verhaeren relinquishes the head coaching position ahead of next year's rescheduled Tokyo Olympics to return home to the Netherlands for personal reasons.
articles.content:
Jacco Verhaeren has stepped down as Swimming Australia's head coach after announcing he will return to the Netherlands for personal reasons.
